context_evidences: - Nike Inc. on Friday suspended its relationship with Brooklyn Nets star Kyrie Irving and canceled its next Irving-branded shoe release in the aftermath of his promotion of an anti-Semitic documentary. Reference: https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/nike-suspends-ties-with-kyrie-irving-cancels-next-shoe-release-2022-11-05/ published on 2022-11-05 02:02:12

- The comments came a day after the team announced it had suspended Irving without pay for at least five games because he “refused to unequivocally say he has no antisemitic beliefs, nor acknowledge specific hateful material” in the film he posted about last week. Reference: https://www.nytimes.com/2022/11/04/sports/basketball/kyrie-irvings-nets-apology-antisemitism.html published on 2022-11-04 19:07:05

- The 30-year-old is heading into his 12th NBA season, although he has appeared in just 103 regular-season games in three years with the Brooklyn Nets. He played just 29 games last year as New York City regulations prevented him from competing without a COVID-19 vaccination. Reference: https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10052464-nets-kyrie-irving-downplays-retirement-speculation-its-not-a-consideration published on 2022-10-15 18:02:22

- The Nets had already suspended Irving at least five games after he stopped short of fully disavowing the documentary on two occasions. Irving later issued a more fulsome apology late on Thursday for promoting a project he said contained "false anti-Semitic statements." Reference: https://www.reuters.com/business/media-telecom/nike-suspends-ties-with-kyrie-irving-cancels-next-shoe-release-2022-11-05/ published on 2022-11-05 02:02:12

- On Friday, Nike, which has produced Irving’s popular signature shoe since 2014, announced that it had suspended its relationship with him “effective immediately” and would not launch the next version of his shoe, the Kyrie 8. Reference: https://www.nytimes.com/2022/11/04/sports/basketball/kyrie-irvings-nets-apology-antisemitism.html published on 2022-11-04 19:07:05

- It initially appeared he would play for a new team in 2022-23, but he exercised his $36.5 million player option this offseason to remain with Brooklyn. Reference: https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10052464-nets-kyrie-irving-downplays-retirement-speculation-its-not-a-consideration published on 2022-10-15 18:02:22
correction_response:
This tweet is misinformed. Kyrie Irving has not announced any plans to retire. In fact, he has publicly stated that he has no intention of stepping away from the sport anytime soon. He has been quoted saying, "I'm never going to stop playing," and "This is not even a debate. It's not a consideration." While he has faced suspension and controversy recently, retirement does not seem to be on the table at this time. 
References: 
https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10052464-nets-kyrie-irving-downplays-retirement-speculation-its-not-a-consideration
https://www.nytimes.com/2022/11/04/sports/basketball/kyrie-irvings-nets-apology-antisemitism.html
note_1_text: This came from a noted fake sports news account and has not actually happened. https://twitter.com/BallsackSports/status/1589059279906295809?t=MYEXIrM5nz3A9PswbbZGhg&s=19
note_2_text: This is clearly a joke, but reads as if it true.  No link to a specific source was provided.

refute_evidences: - No matter what happens, it's clear Irving does not plan to step away from the sport any time soon. Reference: https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10052464-nets-kyrie-irving-downplays-retirement-speculation-its-not-a-consideration published on 2022-10-15 18:02:22

- Nets guard Kyrie Irving, who was suspended indefinitely in the fallout of his social media posts promoting an antisemitic film, will have to meet with Jewish leaders and with the team before he can return to play, General Manager Sean Marks said Friday. Reference: https://www.nytimes.com/2022/11/04/sports/basketball/kyrie-irvings-nets-apology-antisemitism.html published on 2022-11-04 19:07:05

- I'm never going to stop playing," Irving told ESPN's Nick Friedell . "You hear me? Get that—I am never going to stop playing. This is not even a debate. It's not a consideration. Reference: https://bleacherreport.com/articles/10052464-nets-kyrie-irving-downplays-retirement-speculation-its-not-a-consideration published on 2022-10-15 18:02:22

- "“There is going to be some remedial steps and measures that have been put in place for him to, obviously, seek some counseling designated by the team,” Marks said, adding, “We’ll evaluate and see if this is the right opportunity to bring him back.” Reference: https://www.nytimes.com/2022/11/04/sports/basketball/kyrie-irvings-nets-apology-antisemitism.html published on 2022-11-04 19:07:05
